name: IOT
tagline: Receivers and Senders for a basic IOT setup.
body:
iot
===

This Project includes basic receiver and sender codes for a basic iot setup.

Receiver
--------
A web page which shows the recent data sent by the sender

Sender
------
A python script to send information to the server/receiver.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
